Tesla Shareholder Urges Board to Name an Independent Chairman - Bloomberg $TSLA https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2018-04-26/tesla-shareholder-urges-board-to-name-an-independent-chairman

links.title: Tesla Shareholder Urges Board to Name an Independent Chairman
links.description: Tesla Inc. shareholders will vote in June on whether to adopt a policy that the company only allow an independent director to be chairman, a role that Elon Musk has held since 2004. The proposal, submitted by Jing Zhao of Concord, California, argues Tesla shouldn't be an exception to what the individual shareholder called the "prevailing practice" in markets including the U.K.

links.title: At Least 20 Casualties in Superior Explosion
links.description: A contractor who was inside the building told Eyewitness News it sounded like "a sonic boom." He said crews were working on shutting the plant down for repairs. According to the contractor, that is one of the most dangerous times. Superior Police sent a message on Twitter asking people to stay away from the area.

links.title: Jim Keller Joins Intel to Lead Silicon Engineering | Intel Newsroom
links.description: SANTA CLARA, Calif., April 26, 2018 - Intel today announced that Jim Keller will join Intel as a senior vice president. He will lead the company's silicon engineering, which encompasses system-on-chip (SoC) development and integration.
